full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYAB PA SGO BRGYAD GO BLANG BDE BA'I GNAD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001B CES PA 'DI NI PAndI TA BLO BZANG THUB @002A *, ,BSTAN NYI MA DANG DGE BSHES MGON PO GNYIS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,`DUS 'KHOR KHUAS TSAN PA DKA' BU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I KHYAB PA SGO BRGYAD KYI SDOM TSIG GI SPAR 'DI NI DGE TSUL NYI MA SRUNG GIS BSGRUBS NAS ^KHU CAR THA'I KHU RAL TU ZHUGS PA LAGS, ,
